title: Robin Morley Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Robin Morley? Check out all of Robin Morley's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogRobin Morley Sales Specialist Robin Morley Robin Morley is a creative and video specialist at Similarweb, with 20+ years experience working in B2B and B2C marketing. He joined Similarweb from a London agency where he worked on creative strategy and execution for a range of global brands. Robin’s other experience ranges from scrappy start-ups to working in journalism and championing new platforms at BBC News. Based in London, when he’s not hammering away at the laptop, he’s normally either making or listening to music.
